<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Zeal for Battle](/Spells.aspx?ID=1853)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 381 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** You and at least 1 ally are about to roll initiative

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 10 feet

**Target** you and the triggering ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You stoke the righteous anger within yourself and an ally. You and the target ally each roll a d20 and use the higher result for both your initiative rolls. You each still use your own Perception modifier or other statistic to determine your results.
name: Zeal for Battle
